reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This YHA is about 5 minutes walk from the ferry terminal, so an ideal location. There is plenty of wildlife around after dark & a family of fairy penguins can be seen & heard squawking in the garden & you'll be able to see lots of wallabies & more penguins if you walk a few minutes into the town.
reviews.title: Penguins in the garden!
